transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji boliye, bataiye.
Customer: Mera email address, Facebook ki IndiaMART mein channel ID hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Usme us din pehle maine ek saal ka subscription liya hai. Kis naam se sir aapki mujhe industry ka naam batayenge apne?
Han?
Executive: Aapne mujhe uska business ka naam batayenge, kis naam se profile hai aapki IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Eminent Enterprise.
Executive: Haan, Eminent Enterprise. Bataiye.
Customer: Usme ek saal ke liye maine subscription liya hai. Uske liye 81767 rupees GST samet pada hai, theek hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Usme bola bola gaya tha ki mere ko do account manager hire honge.
Han. Uske rahega local manager. Meri ko sir pehle baat chali rahi thi na. To nahi nahi, to bhi meri aapse baat hui thi, aapka account manager baat kar raha hu main.
Hmm.
Executive: Ishan baat kar raha hu, pehchana nahi lagta hai aapne.
Customer: To us pehle bhi meri aapse baat hui thi, koi issue face ho raha hai kya, ye bataiye.
Customer: Sir local jo account manager chahiye.
Executive: Local account manager location pe?
Customer: Sir ek bola tha ki mera area ke aas pass rahega jo mera idhar business bahut hai.
Executive: Local account manager ka koi option hota hai apne pass?
Executive: Nahi, wo local apne field location mein mang raha hai. Possible hai?

(silence)
Executive: Haan ji. Hello.
Hmm. Haan. Haan ji, to main aapko ye bata raha tha sir, jo aapka account manager ko leke concern issue hai, sir genuinely aapka jo ye ROI aur ye jitne bhi lead generation aur jitni service effective cheeze hai, sari sir head office se hi operate hoti hai. To agar aap current level pe field location pe koi apna service service officer ki demand karte hai, account manager ki to aise avail nahi ho pata. Abhi as of now company ne koi aisi policy avail nahi kar rakhi hai. But haan, main aapka yaha pe account manager hu to head office se jo bhi cheeze best operational effectively kaise use karna hai, kaise business dilana hai, to aap mujhse coordinate kar sakte ho har time. To aap jo location based mang rahe ho, to sir har time possible nahi ho pata hai. To abhi as currently wo require abhi available nahi hai. Aap mujhse effectively connect kar sakte ho. Kyunki abhi aapki service chalu hui hai to aisa koi issue nahi aana chahiye jiske liye aapko field location ya field person ki availability ho. Kyunki wo aapse char cheeze batayega sir, usme se ek cheez niklegi, teen cheez nahi niklegi, tab bhi aap mujhse hi connect karoge kyunki main head office pe baitha hu. Sari leads ka generation mere pass hi hai sara aur jitne bhi baki ke accounts hai un sabko main hi head kar sakta hu. To wo cheez aap mujhse directly contact kar lo. Field wale person ke sang issue ye hai wo kabhi aa raha hai nahi aa raha hai to usse aapka backendly wo nahi ban sakta hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Main dusre mein agar main isliye bhi chah raha hu ki aap bahut time busy rehte ho to mera. Sir wo main aapko bataunga dekho, nahi nahi aisi baat nahi hai dekho main aapko batau hota kya hai, agar aap mang ke le bhi loge na to wo full time aapko de hi nahi payega aapke area mein. Fir aap kahoge aapko ultimately karna mujhe hi call padega kyunki wo aapko. Theek hai fir mera product ka listing wagera dekhna hota hai. Wo karna padega kuch consult agar aap se lena hota hai. Agar aap phone agar pick nahi karoge to mera kaam kaise bahut chalega?
Executive: Bilkul sir, phone kyun nahi pick nahi hoga. Abhi aapka abhi aapka call abhi aapka call aaya maine hi uthaya just uthaya maine. Abhi aapka call aaya maine uthaya aapka. Bataye pick kaise nahi hua aise kaise chale?
Customer: Ye to abhi maine complaint number phone kiya to isliye uthaya. Isse pehle to mera dusra jo aapka number hai usme to phone kiya tha aapne nahi uthaya tha. Sir dekho hota kya hai wo jo nahi nahi aapko bola tha ke aapne bola tha ke kal aapko photo bhej dene ke liye aap aap kar doge. Sir mujhe dekho sir main aapko bata raha hu. Ye ye wala work mere pe time mujhe mila nahi. Dusra jo aap mujhe phone kar rahe the main already call pe tha to wo miss ho gayi. Ye wala isliye uthaya kyunki wo call meri khatam hui hai aur aapki call maine pick kar li hai.
Customer: To fir to aapko ek message dal sakte hai I am in call ke busy to baad mein bata sakte ho.
Executive: Main sir main jaise hi meri call end hui hai aapki dusri office wale number pe call aa gayi hai. To main kis gear mein aapko message karta aapne mujhe connect kar liya. Ye hua tha.
Customer: Theek hai. Dusri rahi baat aapke catalog wagera wali ki to sir abhi to main currently is pe busy hu. Aap start kar lo agar aapke time hai to aap start kar lo products ko add karna. Jahan dikkat aayegi main usko follow up kar lunga. Dekho mera agar abhi khud ek din aaj ho gaya to mera laptop abhi servicing ke liye gaya tha. Usse thoda dikkat hua. Isliye phone se sab kam nahi hota hai na isliye. Meri Gopal ji se baat ho rahi hai na. Haan Gopal ji dekho ek kaam karo aap aapke pass jo abhi existing buyleads aa rahi hai abhi jaise wa mujhe aapki welcome call assign nahi hui hai. Jab tak aap unhi buyleads se kaam chalao waha se business uthao. Uske baad main aapke products add kar kar dunga ya kara dunga to usme aap baki buyleads bhi deal karna. Pehle jo existing products aapke catalog mein add hai uski buyleads utha lo acche se. Ek hafta base bana lo. Uske baad jo baki ke bache hue aapki buyleads. Dekho is din mein hafte mein aur main daily ka bonus ka ek lead bhi mil sakta hai aur mera ek hi lead baki hai 10 minute.
Executive: Correct. Theek hai. Theek hai. Wo dono wo lead to abhi kal wo lead dene mein kitna time lagega? 5 minute, 10 minute.
Customer: 5 minute, 10 minute aur calls bhi to aapke pass. Aur aur kisi customer ka agar main photo agar nahi dikha sakta to fir mujhe koi fayda nahi mera agar image nahi hai.
Executive: Customer ko wo aap photo dikha sakte ho lead manager pe jo chat ka option hota hai us pe sab kuch jo maine aapko sikhaya tha quotations, photo sab de sakte ho usi pe. Aapko call karne ki zarurat nahi hai buyer ko. Sab lead manager se directly operate ho jayega.
Customer: Dekho text mein kaun check karta hai isme? Agar call jitna agar aap call karke kisi customer ko jitna samjha sakte ho text pe to utna samjha sakte ho. Usse dekha gaya ki lena hai ki nahi hai bas baat khatam ho gaya. Isme to hum to usse convince kar sakte hai na.
Executive: Convince kar sakte ho aap. Aapko agar baad bhi karte ho call pe phone pe buyer ke sath tab bhi photo to aapko whatsapp ya IndiaMART ki profile se hi bhejni padegi na. Kyunki jo photo aapne catalog mein hoti hai ya let's say jo catalog mein product apna nahi hai aap usko wo de rahe ho aur buyer aapki baat maan bhi raha hai to usko aap personally photo share kar sakte ho. Jab tak aapka wo product add nahi ho raha.
Customer: Theek hai aap dekh lijiye aap agar theek hai Gopal ji mere andar hai agar 100 ka success agar 100 ka success ho gaya warna mere ko dusra manager de dijiye.
Executive: Bilkul main operate kar raha hu abhi aapki services sir do din pehle live hui hai. Bilkul easy easy ho jayiye. Koi koi aisa load nahi hai ki services bilkul aage se bahar se ja rahi hai. Bilkul ek bar base banne dijiye. Har cheez ko start hone mein time lagta hai, going with the base lagta hai. 10-15 din ki baat hoti hai services develop hoti hai, jaan pehchan hoti hai aapki reachability high hoti hai. Aap connect karte hai. Aise aap aapki listing ho gayi sir aapke jaise agar main aapko video meet pe dikhau aur hazar. Phone se aur main abhi phone se karunga to listing to main utna option nahi jispe abhi aapke pass kitne lead generate ki AI system aapne bola gaya tha ki AI system mein kuch mera jo. Bilkul hazar mein aap show kar hazar haan haan hazar hazar suppliers mein aap show show kar rahe ho. Hoga ki nahi hoga? Main wahi to samjha raha hu hazar suppliers mein aap. Main nahi kar sakta sir ye to IndiaMART ke automatic algorithm mein hota hai. Main aapko wahi to bata raha hu ek bar pehle ye hazar suppliers mein aapki jo abhi hosting hui hai usko pehle avail to hone dijiye. Ek bar ye expand ho jayegi uske baad aapka name waha pe showcase karega. Abhi agar main aapko commit kar dunga aur main bolunga ki kal aap sabse top pe dikhne lag jaoge ya medium middle mein dikhne lag jaoge jo ki possible nahi hai. Abhi aapki services live hui hai do din bhi nahi hua. Isko 10 din, do hafte, teen hafte jaane dijiye. Ek bar ye ek rhythm banayega pace banayega uske baad aapki services full strategically avail hogi. Isiliye main aapke jo products hai wo add bhi nahi kar raha kyunki abhi har cheez ko time diya diya jata hai initially starting mein. Ek dam se main main aapka catalog bilkul bhar du 100 product ke sath, 200 product ke sath. Buyer aake hi confuse ho jayega mujhe chahiye kya. Isiliye hamesha minimum quantity se hum start karte hai aur fir dheeme dheeme le aake 100, 200, 300 product karte hai. Dheeme se shuru hoga tabhi to upar jaate hai ya seedha aap upar jump lagana chahte ho.
Right? To main isiliye keh raha hu step by step aap chalo abhi services live hui hai do teen hafte aapka main abhi IndiaMART ke end se aapko acche se calls aayengi. Welcome call aayegi, welcome call two hogi fir main aapse servicing host karunga. Aap dekhte chalo watch out karo. Maine aapko bas backend mein buyleads lene ko chhod diya hai ki aap business baat karte raho. Inquiries lead manager se chat karte raho, calls pe baat karte raho. Baki IndiaMART pe chhod do aap. To isiliye main aapka product isliye bhi nahi dal raha kyunki wo dalne ka koi fayda jitna abhi isliye nahi hai kyunki 40 product aapke already added hai. Usme bahut accha business apne ko milega. To abhi services ko thoda expand hone do grow hone do apne aap business aana shuru hoga abhi do teen hi hue hai. Maine aapko samjhaya bhi tha. Jitna jaldi aap machaoge na to utna kuch mismatch bhi ho sakta hai. Itna jaldi mat karo.
Thik hai dekho.
Executive: Thik hai na? Koi doubt ho bilkul aap mujhe call karo aur agar aapko lagta hai ki main call nahi utha pa raha to mujhe whatsapp chhod do. Whatsapp pe main hamesha available hu. Do minute mein do second mein aapko jawab aa jayega. Agar main aapka next time call nahi nahi bhi utha pa raha. Dekho aapka bhi kaam ho sakta hai mera bhi kaam hai agar maine phone kiya hai. Thik hai? Agar aapne nahi pick up pick up kar sakte ki phone cut kar dega to fir upar mein jo ek option aata hai message ka now I am busy calling you later. Aise kuch message bhejega to. Haan wo main message bilkul bhej dunga. Wo main message message bhej sakta hu aapka phone kaise cut kar dunga mujhe. Koi insan kaise sochega ki maine itna paisa diya pura jale pani mein chala gaya. Are nahi nahi nahi are Gopal ji aisi baat hi nahi hai kya baat kar rahe ho aap. Aise hi to sochega na.
Executive: Bilkul aapki baat sahi hai bilkul aisa sochega but jo maine abhi aapko baki cheeze samjhai wo aapko samajh mein aa gayi clear hai? Jo maine basic samjhaya bilkul aapko usme to koi doubt nahi hai pehle wo bata do mujhe.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi. Ek ek pehli samasya ye. Thik hai dusri samasya aapki jo mera call nahi uth raha hai. Mujhe agar main let's say aapko message nahi kar pa raha aap mujhe whatsapp chhod do main aapko do second mein whatsapp pe revert kar dunga. Kyunki whatsapp pe hum hamesha available rehte hai.
Executive: Thik hai aur jaise hi aapka call aayega 10-15 minute pe mera khud se call back aapko pahunch jayega agar mera phone nahi uthta hai to kyunki main call wall pe rehta hu to miss ho jata hai aur koi dikkat nahi.
Thik hai?
Executive: Main aapka ek bar ye number save bhi kar leta hu aur usko top priority pe mention kar deta hu to wo number nahi miss out hoga right? Baki aap calls aur inquiries is pe engage hote raho divert karte raho unko chat box pe jo lead manager maine aapko sikhaya tha IndiaMART pe aur buyer se connect karte raho thik hai?
Customer: Okay. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a local account manager.

- Executive not picking up calls.

- Wants help with product listing.



Resolution:

- Explained local account manager not possible.

- Advised to connect on WhatsApp if call not picked.

- Asked to start adding products, will follow up.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will save customer's number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, buyleads, product listing
